channel.description: Recent content in Home on Bruno Montezano

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Bruno Montezano. I’m pursuing my MSc in Psychiatry and Behavioral Sciences at the Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul (UFRGS). There’s more info about me on the homepage and my curriculum. Contact You can contact on GitHub (I code almost daily). You can subscribe to the RSS feed of the blog posts. You can also find me on LinkedIn, ResearchGate. About this website This site is created with blogdown (base on Hugo) and the theme is hugo-xmin, a Hugo theme ported by Yihui.

item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Bruno Braga Montezano CV in PDF You can access it here. Contact Information and Social Media Email: bmontezano@hcpa.edu.br Homepage: https://bmontezano.netlify.app GitHub: @brunomontezano LinkedIn: @bmontezano ResearchGate: @Bruno-Braga-Montezano ORCID: 0000-0002-4627-1776 Publons: Bruno Braga Montezano Google Scholar: Bruno Braga Montezano Lattes Curriculum: 5680118320056968 Bio Currently, I am pursuing a Master’s degree at the Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul in the Postgraduate Program in Psychiatry and Behavioral Sciences (CAPES 7 concept) as a Master’s Scholar.
